program main
    implicit none
    integer :: N, i
    integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: A
    integer(8) :: mod_val = 1000000007
    integer(8) :: lcm_val, ans, modLcm
    character(len=20) :: ans_str

children.label: mental_execution

children.text:
Read input
    read*, N
    allocate(A(N)) read*, A

    ! Compute LCM
    lcm_val = 1 do i = 1, N
        lcm_val = lcm(lcm_val, A(i)) end do
    modLcm = mod(lcm_val, mod_val)

    ! Compute ans
    ans = 0
    do i = 1, N
        ans = mod(ans + modDiv(modLcm, A(i), mod_val), mod_val)
    end do

    ! Second step: process ans to get next input
    write(ans_str, '(I0)') ans
    c = ans_str(1:1) c = char(ichar(c) + 1)

    !

program main
    implicit none
    integer :: N, i
    integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: A
    integer(8) :: mod_val = 1000000007
    integer(8) :: lcm_val, ans, modLcm
    character(len=20) :: ans_str
    character :: c
    integer :: oddCount = 0

    ! Read input
    read*, N
    allocate(A(N))
    read*, A

    ! Compute LCM
    lcm_val = 1
    do i = 1, N
        lcm_val = lcm(lcm_val, A(i))
    end do
    modLcm = mod(lcm_val, mod_val)

    ! Compute ans
    ans = 0
    do i = 1, N
        ans = mod(ans + modDiv(modLcm, A(i), mod_val), mod_val)
    end do

    ! Second step: process ans to get next input
    write(ans_str, '(I0)') ans
    c = ans_str(1:1)
    c = char(ichar(c) + 1)

    ! Third step: process c as input string
    ! Count frequency (only one character)
    oddCount = 1  ! since count is 1 (odd)
    if (oddCount <=1 .or. mod(oddCount,2) /=0) then
        print*, 'First'
    else
        print*, 'Second'
    end if

contains

    integer(8) function modDiv(a, b, mod_val)
        integer(8), intent(in) :: a, b, mod_val
        modDiv = mod(a * modInv(b, mod_val), mod_val)
    end function

    integer(8) function modInv(x, mod_val)
        integer(8), intent(in) :: x, mod_val
        modInv = modPow(x, mod_val-2, mod_val)
    end function

    integer(8) function modPow(b, e, mod_val)
        integer(8), intent(in) :: b, e, mod_val
        integer(8) :: ans = 1, x = mod(b, mod_val)
        integer(8) :: y = e
        do while (y > 0)
            if (btest(y,0)) then
                ans = mod(ans * x, mod_val)
            end if
            x = mod(x * x, mod_val)
            y = rshift(y,1)
        end do
        modPow = ans
    end function

    integer(8) function gcd(a, b)
        integer(8), intent(in) :: a, b
        integer(8) :: temp
        gcd = a
        do while (b /= 0)
            temp = mod(gcd, b)
            gcd = b
            b = temp
        end do
    end function

    integer(8) function lcm(a, b)
        integer(8), intent(in) :: a, b
        lcm = a * b / gcd(a, b)
    end function

end program main

program main
    implicit none
    integer :: N, i
    integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: A
    integer(8) :: mod_val = 1000000007
    integer(8) :: modLcm, ans
    character(len=20) :: ans_str
    character :: c
    integer :: oddCount = 0

    ! Read input
    read*, N
    allocate(A(N))
    read*, A

    ! Compute modLcm (LCM mod mod_val)
    modLcm = 1
    do i = 1, N
        modLcm = mod(modLcm * A(i) / gcd(modLcm, A(i)), mod_val)
    end do

    ! Compute ans
    ans = 0
    do i = 1, N
        ans = mod(ans + modDiv(modLcm, A(i), mod_val), mod_val)
    end do

    ! Process second step
    write(ans_str, '(I0)') ans
    c = ans_str(1:1)
    c = char(ichar(c) + 1)

    ! Third step: count frequency of characters in c (single character)
    oddCount = 1  ! since count is 1 (odd)
    if (oddCount <=1 .or. mod(oddCount,2) /=0) then
        print*, 'First'
    else
        print*, 'Second'
    end if

contains

    integer(8) function modDiv(a, b, mod_val)
        integer(8), intent(in) :: a, b, mod_val
        modDiv = mod(a * modInv(b, mod_val), mod_val)
    end function

    integer(8) function modInv(x, mod_val)
        integer(8), intent(in) :: x, mod_val
        modInv = modPow(x, mod_val-2, mod_val)
    end function

    integer(8) function modPow(b, e, mod_val)
        integer(8), intent(in) :: b, e, mod_val
        integer(8) :: ans = 1, x = mod(b, mod_val)
        integer(8) :: y = e
        do while (y > 0)
            if (btest(y,0)) then
                ans = mod(ans * x, mod_val)
            end if
            x = mod(x * x, mod_val)
            y = rshift(y,1)
        end do
        modPow = ans
    end function

    integer(8) function gcd(a, b)
        integer(8), intent(in) :: a, b
        integer(8) :: temp
        gcd = a
        do while (b /= 0)
            temp = mod(gcd, b)
            gcd = b
            b = temp
        end do
    end function

end program main
